name: Satya Special School

address: ECR Road, Near Shivaji Statue, Karuvadikuppam

briefDescription: The objective of Satya is to change the current fragmented rehabilitation system into an integrated holistic rehabilitation system through Special Eductaion, Early Intervention, Theraputic intervention , Vocational training etcdedicated at improving the lives of intellectually disabled children through individual specialized training there by making social inclusion a reality.We cater to 250 urban & 475 rural children covering all disabilities
